lines.text: Uses system of mirrors and lenses to concentrate light, magnify object

secText:
Lesson:
1. Describe [OBJ:expsec_t565:concave and convex mirrors].
2. Define [OBJ:expsec_t566:center of curvature and principal axis].
3. Define [OBJ:expsec_t567:focal point and focal length].
4. [OBJ:expsec_t568:Draw] a ray diagram for a concave mirror.
5. [OBJ:expsec_t570:Draw] a ray diagram for a convex mirror.
6. Apply the concept of concave mirrors to [OBJ:expsec_t571:spherical mirror aberrations].
7. Describe [OBJ:pwsec_t572:parabolic mirrors].
8. Apply the concept of parabolic mirrors to [OBJ:expsec_u282:reflecting telescopes].
